mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE(schedule_num, schedule_title, schedule_content, schedule_writer, schedule_location, schedule_date, schedule_deadline ) VALUES (SCHEDULE_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{schedule_title}, #{schedule_content}, #{schedule_writer}, #{schedule_location}, TO_DATE(#{schedule_date},'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_DATE(#{schedule_deadline},'yyyy-mm-dd') )
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE SET schedule_title = #{schedule_title}, schedule_content = #{schedule_content}, schedule_date = #{schedule_date}, schedule_location = #{schedule_location}, schedule_deadline = #{schedule_deadline}, schedule_joinname = #{schedule_joinname} WHERE schedule_num = #{schedule_num}
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_num, schedule_title, TO_CHAR(to_date(schedule_date,'YY-MM-DD'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') schedule_date, TO_CHAR(to_date(schedule_deadline,'YY-MM-DD'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') schedule_deadline FROM SCHEDULE

SELECT schedule_num, schedule_title, schedule_content, schedule_writer, schedule_location, TO_CHAR(to_date(schedule_date,'YY-MM-DD'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') schedule_date, TO_CHAR(to_date(schedule_deadline,'YY-MM-DD'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') schedule_deadline, schedule_joinname FROM SCHEDULE WHERE schedule_num = #{schedule_num}
